pcook01

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • pcook01.User
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Driver, Passenger

    public abstract class User
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class used to create the building blocks of Drivers and Passengers
    Author:
    patrickcook
